name: mastodon-welcome-bot
description: a mastodon bot that sends out welcome toots to new users

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: the access token for the Mastodon account that you want the toots to be sent from

DAYS_SINCE.description: how many days back of new users you want to send toots to

INSTANCE_BASE_URL.description: the base url of the Mastodon instance you want to run this for

TOOT_TEMPLATE.description: the template of the toot that you want to send out

DEBUG.description: boolean for debug mode. toots aren't actually sent when this is true

ACCOUNT_ID.description: the account ID that you want to pull followers from
